body:
Comment 4: 
I'm unable to reproduce the awk error described this issue. What version of awk are you
using? What is your output for the command awk --version?

I suspect that the problem is related to the fact that some Go Windows port programmers
use obsolete versions of the Windows operating system and/or the MSYS/MinGW toolchain.
The flagship linux/darwin Go implementation expects that reasonably current software
versions are used.
